title: Texas Tech Football receives another $5 million gift - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Texas Tech Football receives another $5 million gift - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Texas Tech Athletics announced Wednesday it has received a $5 million gift to The Campaign for Fearless Champions from supporter Mike Wallace of Midland, which will be dedicated to construction of the Dustin R. Womble Football Center and the south end zone to Jones AT&T Stadium.
